comment.author: 83025347@N00
comment._content: I hope you're storing these nitrate negatives in a safe place.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: @JimRees: The nitrate negatives are indeed safely stored.  A state of the art facility designed to preserve nitrate film movies also provides the special cold temperature and humidity levels that the Library's "still film" negatives need .  -- Helena

comment.author: 83025347@N00
comment._content: Keep up the good work. LoC is one of those pieces of the US govt I don't mind sending my tax dollars to.
